name: Insatiable (Lusitano)
description:
This game was made for Bored Pixels Jam 8. It is my first game for online game jams and therefore my introduction to them. It is also my first-pixel art game overall. It is not finished as it is only a prototype.

If you like isometric turn-based games do comment! I plan to work on this project and perhaps even better ones!

Enjoy!
